nl.tno.stormcv.grouping

Class ModGrouping

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tno.stormcv.grouping.ModGrouping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    backtype.storm.grouping.CustomStreamGrouping, Serializable

    public class ModGrouping
extends Object
implements backtype.storm.grouping.CustomStreamGrouping
    A custom grouping that functions as a filter as well as (optionally) a FieldGrouping. A mod value is provided during construction and is used to filter CVParticle objects. Only objects which sequenceNR % mod == 0 will be passed through the filter. It is possible to supplier a set of Fields which will define what task the accepted tuple will be assigned to (similar to fieldGrouping). If no fields are provided the task is chosen randomly (like shuffleGrouping).
    Author:
    Corne Versloot
    See Also:
